title: Game twitches and teleports to where i click. -Help please
body:
I've recently upgraded my Graphic's card to a Gigabyte Geforce GTX 960 4GB OC Edition, ever since upgrading  i've been experiencing twitches and slight teleports. It stops after minions spawn tho. I get a good 240 fps and 60 ms. I've also tried using V-sync which solves the problem but getting 240 fps is the reason i bought the Graphic's card. 

Any ideas? 
~cgryp1

replies.body: If left uncapped, I know the game can behave very oddly at very high FPS.  However, when you say that you get a good 240 FPS, is it stable at that number?  Or do you leave it uncapped?  Also, is there a specific reason why you wish to keep V-sync disabled?  Enabling V-sync should match League to the power that your monitor has.
